title: Terms of Endearment (1983)[Stereo Widescren Quality DVDrip]
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0086425/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0086425/</a>

DVD Enhanced for 16:9 screen with Stereo Dolby Digital 5.1 Surround sound

Sample included.

Optional English subtitles in separate idx/sub files.

Shirley MacLaine - Jack Nicholson - Debra Winger - Jeff Daniels

I have refused to believe that this all-time classic, winner of 5 Oscars, was produced with mono sound. Imdb has maintained it; all European video distributors and TV or movie channels were sent copies with a mono track, as well as mediocre picture quality.

But now I finally found this remastered DVD and ordered it from the U.S. It does indeed feel like a new film with the music and dialogue alive in the viewing room, and a quality picture without the sides cut off.

Update notice has been sent to Imdb.

Widescreen, XviD 2-pass 704x384, great stereo, AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in my DivX player.
